Reviews.Title: very pretty
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, excellent camera, touch very tameable, fine and elegant recommend for buyers, it would be nice to have WIFI. It is also very good ...

Reviews.Title: Great Company to do business
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: Ordered the LG GM360 phone. Order came on time but upon opening the box, I realized the phone was smaller. Returned the phone and got my refund on time.

Reviews.Title: COMPLETO
Reviews.Author: MARCO VINICIO
Reviews.Content: UN TELEFONO CON TODAS LAS CARACTERISTICAS NECESARIAS PARA MANTENERSE COMUNICADO Y CONECTADOS AL INTERNET CON ACCESO A TODAS LA REDES SOCIALES. LG

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported
5 Megapixel Camera with Auto Focus & Power LED Flash
3.0 Inch Full Touch Screen for Photo Viewing and Easy Use
MP3 Player, Music and Video Playback, FM Radio, Bulit in Social Networking, SMS, MMS & Email
Talk Time: Up to 5 hours, Stand by Time: Up to 300 hours
ProductInfo.Name: LG GM360 Viewty Snap Unlocked Quad-Band Phone, 5 MP Camera, 3 Inch Touchscreen, MP3, FM Radio, International Version - No Warranty (Black)
